author: beverely
title: An amazing hotel
text:
When we arrived Izabella came to greet us, she gave us an upgrade to one of their beautiful suites, which had a four poster bed and star lights sparkling down, a bowl of fruit and a chilled bottle of Prosecco. The staff were all so attentive, we had access to the club lounge which had food, soft drinks, tea and coffee available through out the day. We were provided with a newspaper Sunday morning.The bed was the most comfortable bed we had ever slept in. The whole place was very clean, the bathrooms were amazing. We cant wait to go back again
Room Tip: Floor six was very quiet, did hear any noise at all See more room tips
